casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Brandon Earl SMALLWOOD, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158262
COA: 343789 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 19, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered. We DIRECT the Tuscola County Prosecuting Attorney to answer the application for leave to appeal within 28 days after the date of this order.

The application for leave to appeal remains pending.
